name: Redface - Jeff & Beff in Chaosland
description:
Redface has captured Beff in Chaosland. Jeff heads for rescue but soon he notices that they both have fallen to Redface's evil trap and are now struggling their way through Chaosland. Will they ever escape? It is up to you ;)

This is my second Game Jam game made in a week (Actually in 5 days this time) The game takes some influence from a great game called Just Shapes & Beats. Featuring chaotic appearing shapes, quick maneuvers and kicking music!

I really enjoyed making this game and it turned out to be a very fun game. :) I hope you like it too. :)

Each of the awesome music tracks you hear are made by Oliver Nicus exclusively for this game! See his Instagram --- @olivernicus

----------------------

List of songs:

01 Start
02 Levels
03 Boss
04 Ending

-----------------------

Controls:

Move [wasd / arrows]
Activate Shield [Space]


**************   Have FUN!   ****************
